extension.description: ConfluenceNG is a modern adaptation of Confluence for those who still like the legacy skin but want something more modern

ConfluenceNG is a combination of concepts from many popular skins, and attempts to embrace and integrate their good ideas into a skin that should be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
